choices: Amanda went back to the Cessna
15413.content:
After the DH dwindled to a speck in the distance, Amanda again kneeled beside the half-ruined hangar. Some more pieces of its roof fell in. The Cessna wasn’t all that different from the De Havilland. But, figuring it might get damaged in there, she leaned over, reached in and lifted it out. The tomboy only studied it briefly when she heard a noise.

“Hurry up Weatherby!” the wealthy businessman ordered “We are going to get out of here!”

The pilot was a small, even by normal human standards, slim black man. He looked at his employer and shook his head nervously “Uh-huh, Mr. Johnston, sir! I think we got lucky. I thought we were done-for when that monster picked us up.”

“Oh? And what would you…” Johnston demanded in a cold tone that hid his own fear “in YOUR wisdom… suggest we do?”

Somewhat insolently, Weatherby countered “How should I know? All I know is we’re back on the ground. And, she’s completely ignoring us. I say we sit still and don’t do anything to attract attention.”

“I’m CEO of a Fortune 50 company.” The boss snapped “And I will not trust my life to luck. Nor will I be late for a very important meeting! Now, start that engine and get this jet moving!” He’d been looking out the window when the plane was picked up before and nearly peed himself from fear.

The pilot argued “Sir. Think about it from the mouse’s POV. If it stays totally motionless, then the cat will just pass him by.”

“That is utterly stupid!” Johnston’s voice escalated to a screech. He was really frightened. He pulled out a small gun and pointed it at the black man. “You!! Get this plane moving! NOW!! OR-OR I’LL SHOOT!!!”

Weatherby held up his hands and stuttered “L-l-l-ook b-bboss… y-y-you don’t n-need m-m-me. You’re a p-p-pilot t-to. Just l-l-let me out--”

“Don’t be a coward.” Sneered Johnston “Now. Strap in, or I shoot!”

And with little choice, the pilot began the takeoff process. Weatherby’s hands shook as the jet began to power up, in his mind he decided to race hard for about 30 seconds then release the break. Not normal procedure, but if he could get the mid-sized jet with 747 engines up to speed… well he could hope.

“Well, this one’s almost as pretty as the one I let go.” Said Amanda. The giant girl’s rampage had been halted as she amused herself with the Cessna. Naturally she didn’t know what it was called, but Amanda liked twirling its propeller and spinning its wheels. That was what she was doing right then. She held the plane upside down by the fuselage and was flicking them with her fingers. Then she heard a second noise. The first short, sharp sound was now followed by a steadily increasing whine. Looking around, Amanda did not see anything approaching. At last, she looked in the opening she’d torn in the knee-high hangar, and was shocked to see the Gulfstream rolling.

Lifting the hand holding the Cessna high and away, Amanda instinctively rolled herself and reached for the moving jet. “Shit!” she cursed “Missed!” There was a brief moment where the tomboy looked around in fear of her Mother, then she giggled “Oh, right. Everything’s mine to play with. Heheh including Mom. Anyway…”
15413.title: Lookat the Cessna

choices: The plane skids to a stop
154132.content:
“Back to you, little plane.” said Amanda as she sat up. Just the motion of sitting up, also brought her arm, and incidentally the Cessna back against her body. Her fist was firmly wrapped around the plane almost at the tail. She stroked one wing gently with a finger, then abruptly stopped --- angry! “Waitaminit! I gave that one man PERMISSION to leave!! Just because I put you down doesn’t mean I was done playing with you! AND STOP THAT TEASING WHINE!!”

The Gulfstream shook violently. The CEO cried “What was that?!”

“You know something, sir?” sneered Weatherby “You’d be more useful at the instruments than shouting your fool head off. Might have been a tremor, or some kind of sonic disturbance.”

Amanda got to her feet and spotted the retreating plane. She almost just tossed the Cessna away, but decided “Nah, maybe later, but I’m not done playing with you yet.” So the huge girl set it down, but not on its wheels. She flipped it over and the Cessna’s wings were on the ground its wheels exposed to the late morning sun. “That way it can't get away.”

Suddenly coldly professional, Johnston reported “50mph and accelerating…55… Oh, and you’re fired.”

“Fuck you boss!” Weatherby shot back “If we get out of this I’ll just be happy to live. If not, well, there’s all my benefits for Shelly and the kids. There’s the shaking again. Figure out what it is.”

The CEO glared at his subordinate daring to give him orders, but shrugged. He looked at the radar and his eyes bulged “Whatever it is…it’s huge and it’s coming this way!! I’m gonna toss stuff out the back. GO FASTER!!”

“As if that would make a difference, but at least he’s out of here.” The pilot muttered.

Relieved of the smaller plane, it was only about the length of her forearm, Amanda stomped after her runaway plane and ordered “Stop toy!” Not only didn’t it obey, but she could tell it was accelerating. She was furious “If you don’t stop I’ll stomp you so hard you’ll come out in China!!”

“Didn’t get much done.” said Weatherby in a sarcastic tone “Weight’s only down 400 pounds. Won’t matter much.”

If looks could kill, Johnston’s eyes would have been laser beams “You want a reason to step on it?” he asked. And before the pilot could answer, the CEO flipped on a screen that showed what was going on behind the Gulfstream “Don’t know if she could really stomp us clear through the Earth. But I don’t think I care to find out. And even if not, I’m not interested in meeting a kid that thinks this plane is nothing but one of her toys.”

“She must be two hundred feet tall!” the stunned pilot exclaimed.

The computer voice cut in “Approaching form that of human female aged 8 to 11. Height 150 feet 1.1 inches. Weight 2,636 tons 1437 pounds 8.5 ounces.”

“I MEANT WHAT I SAID!” Amanda yelled. She had been walking quickly, but not running. But now as the whine of the jet engines got even louder she realized she was falling behind. With a skip-step, she began running. In the giant girl’s wake were imprints left by her feet, as if the runway meant for everything up to 747s was more like wet sand. Amanda did not hold back at all, legs and arms pumped. Before she even realized it she’d completely caught up with the fleeing aircraft. The very top of its tail didn’t even reach her knees. She bent over to pick it up, then changed her mind and sprinted ahead, almost to the end of the runway. Huge Amanda turned and watched the oncoming aircraft and grinned. She rubbed her hands together gleefully and said “Come on, my little toy. Come on!”

The two men in the cockpit sighed in relief “Whew! She’s gone, Jesse.” The CEO said with a grin.

“About what I said, sir--” the pilot began.

Only to be interrupted “Can’t remember a thing except you thanking me for a raise and an extra week off. Let’s get this heap in the air, and head h --- ohh SHIT!”
154132.title: Toys Don't Escape

choices: “Dumb thing! I’m going back to the other toy.”
“Duh! Bet I’ll have more fun like this!”
1541322.content:
“Heh-heh, swerve to the left… Hahaha swerve to the right!” chuckled Amanda. She bounced on her toes, matching the movements of the Gulfstream. Her hair, in its customary tight ponytail, came loose increasing her girlish appearance. “Going somewhere? Heh-heh-heh … Just into my hands.”

The men were in a panic “Turn! You fool!! TURN!!” shouted Johnston “We’re going to hit her!!”

“At 85mph??” Weatherby countered sarcastically “You do not make sharp turns at this speed!”

The CEO did not care. With a battle cry “YAHHHHH!!” He yanked on the control between his legs and the nose was forced sharply to the left. It wasn’t the kind of turn that can be made at that speed. The Gulfstream went into a skid. Out of control, it slid sideways until it stopped. Right in the giant girl’s shadow.

“Gotcha, toy.” Declared a grnning Amanda. She’d been slightly alarmed as the plane slid across the runway. Not wanting it broken…well not yet… and definitely not by accident. Her sneakered left foot gave the nose a gentle push, moving the plane to the right. Grin broadening into a full smile, her right foot nudged Amanda’s toy back the other way. She spoke somewhat apologetically “Gotta admit, I was pretty mad… you running away and all. At first anyway. Heehee! But chasing was a lot of fun. I don’t think I can stomp you now.”

Weatherby looked up, way up, All he saw was a darkened tower of flesh. Then the pair were thrown to one side of the cockpit and back again. Then, the size of a billboard, the word “NIKE” settled on the cockpit window. It lingered there for almost a minute, never quite still. The pink of a giant sneaker then slid down and out the pilot window they saw a white sock. Out the co-pilot window was a bare ankle. The pilot nervously said “We have got to get out of here.”

“Going somewhere, toy plane?” asked Amanda in a surprised tone that was laced with giggles. As she studied the Gulfstream from above it began backing away from her “You can’t escape. I told you. You’re my property now.” She allowed it to move for a few seconds, then took two small steps forward and placed her foot behind the plane’s front wheel.

The CEO grunted “<Ooof> What just happened? What’d you run over?”

“Not over, boss.” replied the pilot. And casting an eye upward “More like into. And judging by things, I’d bet a month’s pay it’s her foot.”

Sighing, Johnston reached over and hit the engine switch, powering them down.

“You’re kidding, right?” asked Weatherby “After--”

Johnston cut him off “Yeah you were probably right before. We’ll never know. Regardless, let’s not waste fuel. All we can do now is hope she eventually gets bored.”

“And NOT get seen.” Declared the pilot emphatically.

The CEO nodded most forcefully, then looked out the window “Hmmm…something is going on.”

“No more noise?” Amanda asked, curiously. She looked down with interest, again pushing at the Gulfstream with her foot. It only took about a minute for the giant girl to frown. Running her feet all over the jet somehow was not as fun as she thought it would be. She scratched at her chin, and finally decides.
1541322.title: Foot Toy

15413222.content:
Amanda slapped the heel of her hand on her forehead “I can’t enjoy this in my sneaks. Barefoot’s the only way to go.” She bent over, undid her laces and pulled her feet out of her sneakers. She followed that with sliding off her socks. Amanda felt a sudden rush of power. Tucking her socks in her sneakers, the young tomboy felt her heart quicken and her breathing too. Her gaze swept the airport, down to her toy at her feet and she let out a scream that shattered windows in houses and the distant control tower. The yell was punctuated by fists thumping the giant girl’s chest “Ah-ah-ahahaha-ah-ah-ha-ahah-ah-ahah-aha-ahhh-ahahah!”

“Think we’re clear?” asked Weatherby. It had been two solid minutes. A near eternity since they’d last seen any part of the giant’s body.

Johnston shook his head and whispered harshly “Not a chance!”

“Not like she can hear us.” The pilot scoffed “We are in a sealed cockp—“ Nothing could be heard over what could have been mistaken for a solid minute of the most violent thunder imaginable. Then the jet began moving around again.

In the aftermath of her display, Amanda laughed then watched her toes wriggle freely. She slid a foot beneath her toy, then raised it. The Gulfstream 150 weighed in at about ten tons, not the biggest in the world. But right now one was being effortlessly balanced on the foot of a 9 year old girl. Slowly turning her ankle, Amanda caused the jet to bobble about. She laughed as the nose and tail alternately see-sawed to ground and up again. “I was going to stomp you.” Said Amanda, repeating an earlier remark “But now I’m glad I didn’t. Cute little thing. My feet like you.”

“WHOAA!! YIKE!! AHH!!” what was, to the giant girl, simple play was a violent shaking and bouncing. Even strapped into seats it was terrible. “The…next …time this…plane is…on the ground… I’m out!” both shouted in rhythm to the movement. And briefly, the Gulfstream was on solid ground. But it did not last. Instead, giggles filled their ears as they were thrown from side to side.

Amanda set her toy down and steadied herself on both feet for maybe a minute. Then “Well that wouldn’t fair.” She slid her right foot under the plane, declaring “Equal play time.” But this time, instead of rolling her ankle, Amanda flexed and extended it. Causing the jet to slide up and down her foot. The best part was the gentle taps she felt as the plane alternated between her upcurled toes and the end of her shin. And remembering that it was actually a real plane kept Amanda’s blood pumping “I’m a giant!” she declared happily “And you’re just a toy now.”

“Toy?” asked Weatherby.

His boss took deep offense “This aircraft cost the Company $13.5 million! And it most definitely will not be left in the-the---” Johnston stumbled over the next words.

“…Hands of a child?” Weatherby finished, sounding like a question that really wasn’t. Nor could he keep a sudden smile off his face.

Johnston glowered “Need I remind you that… at this moment… your ‘child’ also has the both of us in her hands.”

“Hmmm…noticed that…” was the pilot’s dry retort “…y’think she wouldn’t if we’d wai—“ His voice was interrupted as the jet thumped, bounced and slid along what he knew was solid ground.

Amanda had casually…one might say carelessly, uncurled her toes. Allowing her foot toy to fall free. Not that she was bored with the Gulfstream. Far from it actually. She was not quite sure how much time had passed and felt the need to check on her propeller toy. So, still holding her sneakers, she looked around seeking the hangar. Nothing seemed to be going on, but she decided to head there anyway. She had a problem however, “If I leave you here,” She addressed the plane, pushing it lightly with her left big toe “You’ll try to escape again. Soooooo…..”
15413222.title: Foot Toy 2

154132222.content:
“Don’t suppose she’s gone?” asked Johnston.

Weatherby looked impatient, replied “You’re not around kids enough. That giant girl is way too interested in us right now. It’s getting dark, so at best we can get away in the night. But I’m all for leaving the plane.”

“Guess I’ll just <uff!!>” Amanda grunted as she heaved one sneaker in the direction of the hangar. Her casually thrown foot gear became a ton and more of deadly missile. She knew at once, she’d underthrown her target by a lot “Damn! And off target too!!”

To the trapped pair it was a shocking sight. A giant shoe bounced atop one of the many mobile staircases, which heavily dented, was propelled into a parked pickup truck. The staircase then fell on it crushing the truck. Meanwhile the giant sneaker rolled and landed, nearly flattening another pickup. The sock came out blanketing it. Rather better than getting crushed. They heard giggling and Johnston demanded “Now how is that funny!?”

“Wonder what I can hit with this one.” Amanda said, still greatly entertained. She wanted to hit the hangar without damaging her other plane. Lightly rolling the couple of tons that was her sneaker between her hands, Amanda tried her best to estimate the distance to the hangar and just how to throw her enlarged footwear. She yelled with effort as her every muscle cooperated in the prodigious throw. As a normal 9-year old girl, it would have been good if she managed the width of a football field. Now, Amanda’s sneaker flew the entire length of one, and easily up and out of a stadium. The sneaker flew a solid mile before it even peaked.

The two men in the Gulfstream whistled long in tribute to the throw. And they were so busy watching where it was they didn’t see where it was going. The car-sized sneaker hit the ground heel first and bounced. The pair gasped as, toe first, it crunchingly landed on a 747. The jumbo-jet suddenly deprived of its middle the two halves skidded in different directions, tail and nose both resting on the ground.

“I really gotta learn to throw straight.” Amanda complained, shaking her head in disappointment. But, then again it was funny the way her sneaker split the largest thing around right in two. The girl’s destructive desires satisfied… for now, anyway… she eyed the Gulfstream. A couple steps and the nose was right between her feet. She was tempted to resume, but sighed “More footsie later, I guess. Come on up. I’ll take you home.”

As a foot passed over the cockpit windows both men cringed. The more practical pilot shrugged. Johnston dove for the door. But luckily for them it just kept going. “uhh… boss…” he began, then urgently “Strap in!”

“Huh…” demanded the CEO as he spun around. And looking up, Johnston saw the giant bending down. Legs mostly bare as she wore a pair of shorts. And a spaghetti-strap top. But he hardly noticed that. What had his attention were the descending hands. He couldn’t take his eyes from them as he stumbled into the co-pilot seat and barely managed to click the belt buckle.

Amanda crouched down, cupped the nose of her toy plane with her right hand and brought her left under the tail. Much more gently than with most of her other playthings, Amanda took the Gulfstream off the ground and stood.

They were thrust from side to side. Then there was the sensation of going UP. When that stopped, Weatherby dared to glance out his side window, and gasped “Oh shit!”

“A pilot! Scared of heights!!” Johnston mocked the slight black man. “We’re what? A hundred feet up? We fly at 15,000 feet!”

Taking a moment, a huge finger ran along the top of the captive jet. And a spare couple of fingers investigated the underbelly of the jet. Just a child idly examining her toy. Amanda leaned back and allowed it to rest upon her chest. She found the landing gear under the jet and played with the wheels.

“That Does Not Sound Good!” declared an alarmed Weatherby. The metal of the aircraft groaned.
154132222.title: 100 Feet Up

choices: Figures out another trick for Dave
1541322222.content:
Although getting more and more fascinated with the jet in her arms, giant Amanda rushed off. Now her hands reversed themselves. Amanda’s right hand slid down the nearly 50 feet of jet to palm much of its tail and wings, while her left pinched its nose.

“YIKES!” squeaked Johnston as the co-pilot window was blocked out by a pink, ridged, object. Just as distressing were several bulges that formed on the opposite side. Then the men suddenly had more to worry about. The previous shaking and tossing about was nothing compared to what was now happening.

From the main passenger cabin came a loud crash, then the sound of debris bouncing all around. The pieces kept getting smaller as Weatherby commented “THAT …was the …bigscreen.”

“You sneaky little things!” Amanda exclaimed, initially very angry. She had been jogging toward the hangar when she noticed there was indeed something happening with her other toy. The giant girl saw the Cessna suspended between a pair of cranes and charged. She thought the tiny people’s efforts so futile that she laughed, even though she doubled her speed.

Three men and a woman were busily at work trying, inexpertly, VERY, to put the Cessna to rights. Two men attempting to operate the cranes, the third plus the woman running back and forth giving instructions. And with the noise of the machinery and concentration on their task, they were not aware of approaching danger.

“It’s not nice to steal from children!” Amanda bellowed as she took her last few steps, coming to a halt. Her first concern was to steady the Cessna with a finger. The propeller driven plane was swaying dangerously on a string she could barely see. Eyeing the tiny man and woman at her feet she told them “Gotta put this down. I’ll deal with you in a sec. Don’t even think of moving.”

Both men breathed sighs of relief as the Gulfstream was lowered. They could feel it. And when the landing gear scraped solid ground they slapped hands. The pair looked into the passenger cabin and saw devastation. Plush chairs tossed about, shattered remnants of a television and destroyed light fixtures dangling from the ceiling. Weatherby burst out a semi-coherent laugh and exclaimed “Hope you got insurance boss!”

“Stop insect!” Amanda snapped, sharply. She stomped right in the path of the man escaping from one of the cranes. The girl barely felt an insignificant bump to her big toe. Her foot swept around as she spun back to the terrified couple. And, smart girl that she was, Amanda bent over the other crane and smirked “HA! Knew it!”

The crane was, except for its nearby twin, the largest the Airport had. It was an impressive fifty feet tall, which meant all it came to was a bit above the giant girl’s knee. The Operator’s Booth was about half-way up the steel frame and unlike his brother, Dave was facing the wrong way to see the approaching giant. And by the time he did it was too late. Dave watched from his perch as his whole group was trapped. Whispering to himself “My best hope is to stay quiet. Right here. It won’t see me.”

“BOO!” exclaimed Amanda with a mischievous smirk. And she outright laughed as she watched the tiny man practically jump out of his pants. Then, she became utterly frightening “You tried to steal my toy! Get out of there and into my hand and you’ll die quickly!”

Dave’s lip trembled. He was only 20. He was terrified and way too young to die. He looked into an eye that seemed as big as he was and shook uncontrollably. His head turned left and right and he whimpered “N-nn-no.”

“Noooo?” Amanda drawled out with a smirk. She poked the Operator’s Booth with a single finger. The crane was painted yellow and the booth’s frame fire-engine red. Amanda sat herself down, circled her legs around the three on the ground and leaned her face closer. She licked her lips menacingly and said “Looks like a tomato. With a treat inside. Hehheh yummy!”

Mouth twisting in horror, Dave screamed incoherently. The young man looked about wildly but it seemed every turn he made led to a wall of pink flesh. He finally curled into a ball in the seat and cried “Pleeezeee! DON’T EAT ME!!”

“LEAVE HIM ALONE!” yelled the woman who was trapped between the walls of flesh that were Amanda’s legs.

And she looked down. The huge girl wasn’t exactly sure how to get the man out of the crane, so she…
1541322222.title: Back to the hangar

choices: Amanda decides bravery should be rewarded.
15413222222.content:
Amanda growled at the tiny couple between her legs. She slapped one against the ground tossing them around, and snapped “Shut up!”

“Whew!” Dave sighed as the giant’s attention was distracted. He began to wonder if he might get out of this situation by sheer dumb luck.

But the giant girl turned back drawling out the words, “So much like a tomato. Bet I could just…pluck … you … off the vine.” Amanda slowly extended her hand, enjoying the tiny man’s frightened expression. Lightly, to her perspective, fingertips brushed the clear round container. The top, front, sides and bottom.

“Ahh!” gasped Dave fearfully as pink things, as big or ** “Yikes!” ** bigger than him examined what had been his safe haven. Now, it seemed more like a prison. ** “Nyahh!” ** At least she hadn’t figured out how to open the door. The poor young man could not go anywhere in what he had considered his safe place without encountering fingers. Dave finally decided “Maybe this wasn’t such a good idea. Help. Please. Someone.”

Back inside the Gulfstream 150, the two men looked out windows in the main cabin “You have shown you understand children better than I.” the CEO admitted “The giant seems distracted now.”

“True, sir.” Weatherby acknowledged “And it’s not a bad idea. But I don’t think so. Yeah, she doing …something… else, right now. But, it’s a lonnnnng way to cover. And all it’d take is a turn of her head. I wouldn’t risk it.”

Amanda was greatly amused by his scrambling about. But her explorations helped her decide that she didn’t need to get him out of his container. The giant girl withdrew her right hand and extended the left one. And, fingertips first, slid beneath the Booth. Then whole fingers, and finally what to her was a transparent tomato was fully in Amanda’s palm. She curled them around the back and tugged experimentally, saying “Mine now, little man.”

“Wazzat!” exclaimed Dave on hearing a creaking sound. He spun around, saw the fingers. Followed them to the giant palm visible beneath the clear Plexiglas under his feet. Another creak! Metal grinded against metal! The steel frame of the Operator’s Booth was secured to the crane by half a dozen inch thick steel plates, bolted on by fist-sized screws. It would hold the weight of more people than could possibly fit in the Booth and he knew that. Nervously, quietly, Dave looked at them and asked “Why doesn’t that make me feel safe?”

Amanda wriggled and twisted at it, rather like a loose tooth. After just a few seconds of effort, she felt something break. Then another, and another. Grinning widely, Amanda steadily pulled, the last tiny bolt stripped its screw and the container, little man and all, was free of the crane. “Now why were you trying to steal my toy?” she demanded.

“You got it all wrong!” Dave shouted fearfully.

And from inside her huge legs, the man on the ground yelled up “Leave him alone! It’s MY plane!!”

“Hmm…” the giant girl paused, considering. Meanwhile, idly rolling the container around in her hands. First left, then right, and back again.

The woman, highly alarmed, pleaded “D-don’t do th-that. My brother’s in there!”

“Then I guess it would bother you if I did this?” asked Amanda as she looked down at the trapped woman.

And she shrieked up at the giant “You crazy psycho bitch!!”

“NO PAULIE!!” the man shouted. And he interposed himself between her and the giant girl’s gaze.
15413222222.title: The Crane

154132222221.content:
Amanda considered her options, glancing at the container in her hand. She lifted it out of her palm and rolled it about on her fingertips “You sound mighty important.” She commented “Tell me, little man … do you take responsibility for trying to steal my toy plane?”

“It’s not a toy! And it does not belong to you!” declared the woman “I demand --!!”

A fist easily the size of a car slammed the ground. It was, with room to spare, taller than the couple “Not in much of a position to demand anything!” sneered the giant girl. Then she giggled “Always wanted to say that!”

“Yes, I do!” he cupped his hands at his mouth and called back. “Please let Dave go!”

Amanda considered the ball she held and asked “Is that your name? Little man? Dave?” And satisfied with the frantic nodding, she looked back at the couple, resumed rolling the ball between her palms. “And what’s your name?”

“Steve!” he answered.

Amanda shook her head “Nah…I don’t like that name. I think I’ll call you Bud.” she giggled in amusement and added “Well, let me think about it. Ok, Bud, how about trading places with your friend? Get inside my little tomato.”

“Sure, I guess.” He replied.

“Not good enough.” Declared the huge girl as she lowered Dave, and the control booth toward the ground, and ordered “Ask me. I want you to convince me to LET you in.”

Feeling embarrassed, Steve got to one knee and asked “Please, ma’am. Would you allow me to trade places with my friend?”

“Not bad.” She smiled down at him, and gently pushed her tomato against the little man “But, sorry Bud. Not good enough. Try again.”

Steve did not bother correcting the giant girl’s name for him. Getting back to his feet after being knocked down by the control booth, he stood there considering ‘What would a kid most want to hear?’ Dave shrugged off his jacket and addressed her “Oh giant miss! See my well muscled body! You must want me for your toy. Of course, I’m already yours, but please let me be your plaything now. I beg of you.”

“Hehehehe.” Amanda giggled “Bit silly there, Bud! Hmmm… Plaything? … I think I like that. Haha. Ok MY Plaything, you can get in my tomato, little Bud.” She slid her finger, turned the ball with her fingers and giggled more as her first captive tumbled out.

“Get out of here, Dave!” ordered Steve as he pulled his brother-in-law to his feet.

To which, the other man protested “No way Steve! I-“

“I don’t see my plaything climbing!” the giant kid observed “Get in there Bud! Move that little body. Or I’ll just take all three of you.”

The men nodded to each other. Dave walked over to his wife and they watched as Steve caught hold of the door and pulled himself in. The giant girl did not make it easy for him, spinning the Control Booth. “That’s mean! Doing that!” yelled the woman.

“Oof!” grunted Steve as his momentum carried him in. Head over foot, he rolled this way and that.

In the jet, still too close to the huge girl, the trapped men looked at each other “Err… what’s she going to do with him?” asked Johnson.

“Boss, I think this day’s gone too weird for me to even guess.” Weatherby replied with feeling.

And, meanwhile, the military was moving in. Inside the lead tank, Colonel Sharpe ordered his command of 26 M1A1 Abrams machines to come to a halt. He was proud of the 60 ton engines of destruction he commanded. They were an impressive 30 feet long, 12 feet wide, and 8 feet high. And, so far none had ever been lost in a tank to tank battle. Safely out of visual range of the monster he dismounted and was met by his deputy. “Major, you’re to take half our force.” he ordered “Circle around to this hill, west of the target. Do not top it. Remain below line of sight.”

“We’re not attacking, sir?” asked Major Webber.

The commander countered “Absolutely not. The situation, at the moment, is fairly contained.”

“I disagree, Colonel.” Webber argued “Nearly $1 billion worth of damage in the city. And that monster is carelessly using millions more worth of aircraft and machinery like toys. To say nothing of the lives of the people in them.”

Sharpe nodded thoughtfully and addressed him “Always thought you’d make a good accountant, Webber. While you’re counting it up, consider the nearly $1/2 billion in tanks, weapons, fuel and training in this company. I am not going to just charge into ignominious defeat because of a handful *hahah* of civilians who were too stupid or too slow to get out of the way.”

“Yes, sir.” The subordinate replied, somewhat resentfully.

The commander reinforced himself “Remember Major, we are the only armor in a week’s travel of here. If we can’t handle this crisis, the President is going to give it to the Air Force.”

“We wouldn’t want that, sir.” Webber answered dutifully.

Colonel Sharpe concluded “Get into position, and wait for further orders. You should be in place about dusk.”
154132222221.title: Swapping Toys

1541322222212.content:
After the Major’s departure, Colonel Sharpe and several of his staff turned their high-powered binoculars on the cause of the crisis. He stood apart with one of the men he’d been through battle with “Sarge, you got me through Kuwait and Iraq. I’m not a scared plebe anymore, but there’s no training for that.”

“I didn’t do anything but kick a Lieutenant who just needed somewhere to start.” Replied the enlisted man. “But, to be honest Colonel, you’re entirely welcome to this one. I’ll do what you order of course, but I’d really rather not open fire on someone no older than my daughter.”

Sharpe grinned at his old comrade and answered “I’m reminded of Gulliver’s Travels, Sarge. Think we can manage something along those lines?”

“Sir, I-i-i-I think, th-that is … you sh-should see this.” A young private was watching the giant girl’s latest game.

As he was raised to the huge face, Steve rolled about helplessly inside his prison curled in a ball. He hadn’t the time to get into the Operator’s chair before the detached Booth started up. Finally the assent ended. Not shocking, but still frightening, was her gleeful expression “Umm… hi…uhh what do I call you?”

Amanda lifted the red ball grinning as she could see the tiny man rolling about “Good little plaything.” Delighted Amanda offered. She held it effortlessly. Knowing that before her mysterious growth he was probably twice her height and three times as heavy, thrilled her. “You even look small compared to my tomato, Bud. And it doesn’t even quite fill my hand. Call me? Hmmm..not sure. What do playthings usually call their owners?”

“Owner?” asked Steve, a touch of worry in his tone. “Umm… why do you say it’s a tomato?” He had accidentally set his young captress’ mind on a new course.

She licked her lips and slowly spun the container around. A little drool ran down Amanda’s chin as she told him “I love tomatoes. They’re delicious, Bud. I just love going into the garden and pluck one off the vine. Just like you. And Mom would let me bite into one.” And with the last word, she licked it.

“YAHH!!” Steve squealed. He backed himself into the far side of the Control Booth. He saw a smear of drool and cringed.

Amanda looked down her nose at the tiny man’s futile scrambling and giggled. Like the small ball it was to her, the 150 foot girl turned it on her fingertips dragging her lips the whole way around “MmmmHmmm…tasty. Maybe you’re just not a plaything, Bud. Might be a snack, too.” She said softly, but plenty loud enough for the tiny man to hear “Was that your little body I kissed?”

“Yes ma’am, it was.” Steve answered with a quiver in his tone “Umm…when you, ulp, eat me we agreed you’ll let my friends go.”

She briefly pushed the side her tomato into her mouth and slowly twirled it about. Not all of it could fit, of course, but Amanda enjoyed it. Nor was it hard to imagine poor Bud looking around fearfully. That made her giggle though she spun it about and pushed it with her tongue. Then, yanking it out with a <<pop>> she grinned in and replied “Don’t remember that promise, Bud. Anyway, if you’re real yummy-----”

Steve yelled in protest, but was instantly too busy to talk. He held onto the control chair, hoping that the huge girl wouldn’t simply crack open the plexiglass with her teeth and swallow him. And, back in the Gulfstream, CEO and pilot watched in horrified fascination at the sight.
1541322222212.title: Mouth Toy
